programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o schedkwhennamed.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 48000 ksmps = 16 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
; Example by Jonathan Murphy 2007
gSinstr2 = "printer"
instr 1
ktrig metro 1 if (ktrig == 1) then ;Call instrument "printer" once per second schedkwhennamed ktrig, 0, 1, gSinstr2, 0, 1
endif
endin
instr printer
ktime timeinsts printk2 ktime
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> i1 0 10 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
